summary: Blades sword retextured, much cleaner look, no bo-hi (groove), alternatively with daisho wearing style. Additionally a Blades Side Sword (wakizashi) to accompany your katana.
descriptionHtml:
Blades sword retextured, much cleaner look, no bo-hi (groove). See screenshots.

Alternatively including a daisho wearing style version: wear a wakizashi aside of the main sword. The smaller sword is purely decorative and not functional.

Daisho and single style are not compatible, CHOOSE ONE VERSION ONLY!

Ver 1.1:  Additionally there\'s an optional file to add a side sword to pair with the katana. It can be found in Delphine\'s chest in her secret chamber in the inn in Riverwood.

If you want a two-handed katana, see my Muramasa mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4232


(note: if you are also using one of my other katana mods:
Daisho mod : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4936
Wearing Position mod : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4860
They are now incorporated in this mod, and will be overwritten if you use both of them)
author: Abakus

files.name: Daisho style katana and decorative wikizashi
